Hey "Main Avatar" can I borrow your phone to play some games?
I'm sorry :(. I lost it. But I promise I'll give your phone back in a minute.
Ha! I knew it. I'm just gonna download a few of my fav apps...
My phone was my baby too til I dropped it last week. Pleasee just for an hour?
Geez. Never ask me for homework help in Math class again then. Bye.
Alright alright. I just had to try. See you in Math class "Main Avatar".
